function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Environmental sampling conducted in an airborne infectious-disease zone in a hospital.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through air and surfaces.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures and sanitation protocols in the sampled areas.","Technologies":"Use air purification technology and surface disinfection technology to reduce the risk.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and other hospital staff in the sampled areas.","Owner":"Hospital management and infection control team."}]}
